p: For species undergoing declines in distribution, the mean value of coherent index ( CI) change will be −16.2% for the 2050s and −19.6% for the 2070s; for species undergoing increases in distribution, the mean value of CI change will be 5.9% for the 2050s and 6.6% for the 2070s. Under climate change, species with higher area change (decrease or increase) will have higher CI changes ( Fig. 3).
